title: Uber broke laws, duped police and secretly lobbied governments, leak reveals
content:
1. Uber broke laws, duped police and secretly lobbied governments, leak reveals  The Guardian
  2. Uber Files: Massive leak reveals how top politicians secretly helped Uber  BBC
  3. Uber leveraged violence against its drivers to win favor over taxis  The Washington Post
  4. What are the Uber files? A guide to cab-hailing firm’s ruthless expansion tactics  The Guardian
  5. Uber lobbied Netanyahu, the PMO, ambassadors to overcome objections to legalizing its operations in Israel  The Times of Israel
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: Uberは法律を破り、警察を騙り、政府に密かに働きかけたことがリークで判明
泄密者称Uber违反法律、欺骗警察并秘密游说政府
泄密者稱Uber違反法律、欺騙警察並祕密遊說政府
